events.message: We have received the application for the Senior Software Engineer position and have started the review process.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the Engineering cluster after confirming relevant developer experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidate's application and coordinate next steps.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed where the candidate showed strong understanding of software engineering principles.
The candidate replied promptly confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 18th with the lead engineer panel to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was conducted successfully; candidate demonstrated advanced coding ability and system design knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and employment terms with the candidate.
HR interview was completed; candidate showed enthusiasm for the company values and team environment.
A formal employment offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date details.
Candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the agreed-upon start date.
Candidate onboarding process has commenced with setup of company accounts and introductory training sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate integrated successfully into the engineering team.
